armNamespace.description: Azure Resource Manager namespace for RemoteApp service environments.
armNamespace.name: armNamespace

get.description: Gets the account associated with the subscription id.

post.description: Updates the account PrivacyUrl and WorkspaceName.

get.description: Gets the list of collections details in the subscription.
Gets available template images in the specified location

put.description: Publishes a new application or updates a previously published application.

parameters.description: Details of the applicaton to publish or modify
parameters.name: applicationDetails

get.description: Gets a list of all RemoteApp users associated with the given collection.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group

delete.description: Deletes a user from the given collection.

put.description: Adds a user to the given collection.

accountLocation.description: The home location for the account

billingState.description: The billing state of the account

isDesktopEnabled.description: Whether or not desktops are enabled on this account

maxPublishedAppsPerService.description: The maximum number of apps per collection

maxUsersPerService.description: The maximum number of users per collection

privacyUrl.description: Admin-defined URL to the privacy statement

rdWebUrl.description: The URL users can go to to access available apps

trialEndTime.description: Trial end time for the account when in trial billing state

AccountDetailsAll.description: A wrapper for account details to be used as a parameter and a response.

locationList.description: List of locations for creating a collection.

AccountDetailsWrapper.description: A wrapper for account details to be used as a parameter

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

AccountDetailsWrapperList.description: A wrapper for account details to be used as a response.

ActiveDirectoryConfig.description: Details of a RemoteApp active directory configuration.

DomainName.description: The name of the on-premise domain to join the RD Session Host servers to.

OrganizationalUnit.description: The name of your domain's organizational unit to assign the RD Session Host servers to, e.g. OU=MyOu,DC=MyDomain,DC=ParentDomain,DC=com. Attributes such as OU, DC, etc. must be in uppercase.

ServiceAccountUserName.description: The user name of a service account that has permission to add computers to the domain. The username must be specified in the UPN or down-level logon name format (user@some.domain or some.domain\user).

applicationAlias.description: A short unique name for the application.

availableToUsers.description: A flag to denote if the application will be available to end users.

commandLineArguments.description: Optional command-line arguments to pass to the application.

iconPngUris.description: The available map of icon PNG file URIs for different resolutions (e.g. 16x16, 32x32, 64x64). The key of the map is the first dimension of the PNG resolution.

iconUri.description: The URI for the application's default icon PNG file.

virtualPath.description: Path to the application.  The path should reference default operating system environment variables such as %ProgramFiles%, %ProgramFiles(x86)%, %SystemRoot%, etc. where possible.  For example, use '%SystemRoot%\notepad.exe' rather than 'C:\Windows\notepad.exe'.

ApplicationDetailsList.description: List of application details used to create or update a collection.

DetailsList.description: List of publishing details for remote applications.

BillingDate.description: The input to get usage details.

flatMeterId.description: The MINT ID for the flat rate

flatMeterKey.description: Key for the flat meter for the billing system

overageMeterId.description: The MINT ID for the overage rate

overageMeterKey.description: Key for the flat meter for the billing system

BillingPlan.description: Contains details of a billing plan.

billingMeters.description: List of meters for this billing plan

minimumBilledUserCount.description: Minimum number of user to bill.

specString1.description: Some information displayed about the plan for portal use

specString2.description: Some information displayed about the plan for portal use

Collection.description: The response for the get collection operation.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

CollectionCreationDetails.description: The details for creating a collection.

allowedPrincipals.description: A list of allowed security principals

billingPlanName.description: The plan name associated with this collection.

collectionLocation.description: The home location for the account

customRdpProperty.description: Optional customer-defined RDP properties of the collection.

notDomainJoined.description: True if the collection is domain joined, false otherwise

publishedApplications.description: A list of details of the published applications

readyForPublishing.description: A flag denoting if this collection is ready for publishing operations.

resourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group the collection is in

sourceImageSasUri.description: SAS URI for an OS image in the VM library

subnetName.description: The subnet name of the customer created Azure VNet.

templateImageName.description: The name of the template image for the collection

virtualNetworkId.description: The ID of the Vnet for the collection

vnetName.description: The name of the Vnet for the collection

waitBeforeShutdownInMinutes.description: The amount of time to wait, in minutes, before forcing logoff.

CollectionCreationDetailsWrapper.description: Details of collection creation operation results.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.
URL to use for request paging.

count.description: Number of samples taken over the aggregation period

maximum.description: Maximum value of the metric over the aggregation period

minimum.description: Minimum value of the metric over the aggregation period

timeCreated.description: Time when the metric value sample was taken

total.description: Total number of metric values over the aggregation period

aggregationMinutes.description: Number of minutes over which the metric is aggregated

adInfo.description: The domain join details for this collection.

billingPlanName.description: The plan name associated with this collection.

customRdpProperty.description: Optional customer-defined RDP properties of the collection.

diagnosticDetails.description: Details of diagnostics for the collection. Each entry in this list is in the form of Key#Value.

diagnosticOperations.description: List of diagnostics operations for the collection.

healthStatus.description: List of collection health status messages

lastErrorCode.description: The last operation error code on this collection.

lastModifiedTimeUtc.description: UTC date and time of the last modification of this collection.

maxSessions.description: The maximum number of concurrent users allowed for this collection.

officeType.description: If the template image for this collection includes Office this will specify the type.

readyForPublishing.description: A flag denoting if this collection is ready for publishing operations.

sessionWarningThreshold.description: The end-user session limit warning threshold.  Reaching or crossing this threshold will cause a capacity warning message to be shown in the management portal.

subnetName.description: The subnet name of the customer created Azure VNet.

templateImageName.description: The name of the template image associated with this collection.

trialOnly.description: Trial-only collections can be used only during the trial period of your subscription. When the trial expires or you activate your subscription, these collections will be permanently disabled.

virtualNetworkId.description: The ID of the Vnet for this collection.

vnetName.description: The VNet name associated with this collection.

CollectionUsageSummary.description: Details of usage summary operation results.

CollectionUsageSummaryList.description: A list of usage summary details

value.description: A list of usage summary details

includedUsage.description: The number of hours used which are included in the billing plan's base rate.

overageUsage.description: The number of hours used beyond the billing plan's included usage, but not exceeding the billing plan's maximum cost.

totalUsage.description: The total usage hours by the user.

waivedUsage.description: The number of hours used beyond the billing plan's maximum cost.  These usage hours are not billed.

includedUsage.description: The number of hours used which are included in the billing plan's base rate.

overageUsage.description: The number of hours used beyond the billing plan's included usage, but not exceeding the billing plan's maximum cost.

totalUsage.description: The total usage hours by the user.

waivedUsage.description: The number of hours used beyond the billing plan's maximum cost.  These usage hours are not billed.

result.description: Result of diagnostic operation. Zero indicates success; other values indicate errors.

Location.description: The location a resource can be in.

displayName.description: The display name of the location

provider.description: The name of the resource provider

resource.description: The name of the related resource

name.description: The name of the operation being performed on this particular object.

origin.description: The intended executor of the operation.

nextLink.description: URL to use for request paging.
The URL for requesting next page of resources.

applicationVirtualPath.description: The application virtual path with respect to local machine.

errorMessage.description: Error message with respect to operation result.

PublishingOperationResult.description: Details of publishing / unpublishing operation results.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

aadObjectId.description: For OrgId principals, the principal's Azure ActiveDirectory object ID

SecurityPrincipalErrorDetails.description: The security principal which failed this operation and the error.

error.description: The security principal operation result error code, if any.

errorDetails.description: Additional details about the error code, if available.

SecurityPrincipalInfo.description: Contains details about the security principal and that principal's consent status for this collection.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

SecurityPrincipalInfoProperties.description: Contains a security principal and that principal's consent status for this collection.

SecurityPrincipalOperationErrorDetails.description: Operational results of adding or removing a security principal.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

Session.description: The wrapper for the session object

SessionList.description: The response for the get session list operation.

logonTimeUtc.description: The UTC time the session started

state.description: The session state. Possible values are 'Active', 'Disconnected', 'NoSession', 'Unknown'

userUpn.description: The Upn of the currently active user

message.description: Message to send to the specified user.

StartMenuApplication.description: Definition containing details of Start Menu applications.

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

StartMenuApplicationListResult.description: Definition containing details of Start Menu applications.

commandLineArguments.description: The command line arguments to launch the application.

iconPngUris.description: The available map of icon PNG file URIs for different resolutions (e.g. 16x16, 32x32, 64x64). The key of the map is the first dimension of the PNG resolution.

iconUri.description: The default URI to the application icon png file.

virtualPath.description: The application image path on the destination machine specified with environment variables for the drive and known system path.

TemplateImage.description: The wrapper for the template image object

TemplateImageList.description: The response for the get template images operation.

locationList.description: The list of locations where the image can be used

numberOfLinkedCollections.description: The number of collections linked to the template image.

officeType.description: If the template image for this collection includes Office this will specify the type.

status.description: The status of the template image

templateImageName.description: The friendly name for the image

templateImageType.description: The type of the template image.

trialOnly.description: A TrialOnly platform template image may be used only during a subscription's RemoteApp trial period. Once billing is activated, a collection using a TrialOnly template image will be permanently disabled.

uploadCompleteTime.description: The time when the template image upload was completed.

UsageDetailsInfo.description: URI information about the usage details CSV file

resultId.description: ID of the CSV file creation operation

VirtualMachineDetailsListResult.description: A list of virtual machine details

nextLink.description: URL to use for request paging.

value.description: A list of virtual machine details

logoffMessage.description: Message to display to the user.

logoffWaitTimeInSeconds.description: Time to wait before restarting the virtual machine.

VmCommandDetailsWrapper.description: A wrapper for virtual machine command details to be used as a parameter

nextLink.description: The URL for requesting next page of resources.

loggedOnUserUpn.description: List of the users logged onto this virtual machine.

VmDetails.description: The response for the get virtual machine operation.
